Change has been successfully rebased and submitted as d6e10ada58b41970933eacfd7750a467602f4f38

please improve like as suggested: 
https://gerrit.openbmc.org/c/openbmc/pldm/+/70327/comment/8c53f2b7_1d5cc344/
Done

please change as per below:
Host Effecter json file '{PATH}' does not exist.
Done

please improve trace here:
Host is not up and Current host state is:{CURRENT_HOST_STATE}
Done

what is LIBPLDM_ERROR error? it's just an status of API.
if it's mentioned in lg2 json like : LIBPLDM_ERROR:-1  => how do you know what is the error?
please correct it.
Done
this should work without any typecasting, i have done it already in earlier commit.
Done
c_str() is not required.
Done
please remove typecasting.
Done
please remove type casting
Done
do you want to print which json file is not present?
Done
do you want to print which json file parsing failed?
Doesn't add much value, I think we can continue with this.
do we need conversion here?
As discussed, I will take this up a separate commit where I will remove all the unnecessary type casting in logs.
why hex conversion is needed for rc?
I did not change it, Additionally maybe during debugging or something it may have been needed to be printed in hex so it is there.
why conversion is needed for rc ?
I did not change it, Additionally maybe during debugging or something it may have been needed to be printed in hex so it is there.

do you think only effecter ID(which is invalid) is enough to debug the issue? 
there could be problem with other input parameter which got changed.
print more data to identify the issue.
Done
please print more variable which adds value in case of issue.
Done
please print more variable which adds value in case of issue.
Done
please print more variable which adds value in case of issue.
Done
there is no severity related logs are there, all severity related log has been removed from upstream.
I was implying by severity level of logs is using error, info, etc. appropriately and corrected it for logs wherever required.

does 'remote pldm terminus' refer to any hypervisor or pldm client ?
or only 'remote terminal' is good?
rephase like "Effecter file for remote terminus does not exist"
Done
Done

why this 'failed' is always last?

use always in begging as discussed in all patches.
Done
rephase "Remote Terminus is not UP/Active, Current Remote Terminus status is:"
Done
